subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Lorena Ochoa, who has been playing Ping equipment for the last 10 years, will finally be paid to use it under a multiyear agreement that varies slightly from most Ping contracts.
snippet: Lorena Ochoa, who has been playing Ping equipment for the last 10 years, will finally be paid to use it under a multiyear agreement that varies slightly from most Ping contracts.
